title: Remove AMONGSTT token from whitelist

requirements.text: Remove AMONGSTT token entry from the DEFAULT_TOKENS array in frontend/src/lib/tokenConfig.ts, keeping the remaining 10 tokens (JewNomicaN, GreedyJEW, HEBROID, ASC, RPR, PLR, ARK, Schmeckles, MKS, TriForce, DeerChickenn) intact
acceptanceCriteria: AMONGSTT token is no longer present in DEFAULT_TOKENS array
All other 10 tokens remain in the whitelist unchanged
Token configuration loads correctly without AMONGSTT

requirements.text: Verify that any existing localStorage token configurations containing AMONGSTT are handled gracefully, allowing users who previously added AMONGSTT to continue seeing it until they manually remove it from their custom configuration
acceptanceCriteria: Existing localStorage configurations with AMONGSTT continue to work
No errors occur when loading saved configurations that include AMONGSTT
Users can manually remove AMONGSTT through the token configuration interface if desired

constraints: Do not modify any token entries other than AMONGSTT
Do not change the token configuration persistence logic
Maintain backward compatibility with existing localStorage data
nonGoals: Forcing removal of AMONGSTT from user's custom token lists
Changing the arbitrage comparison logic or UI
Modifying any other token properties or issuer addresses
